channel.title: refactoring on Dirk Groot
channel.description: Recent content in refactoring on Dirk Groot

item.title: Robot Worlds 3: Client
item.description: <summary class="dg-summary"> Now that we have a server that can receive a request over TCP, handle it and send a response back, it looks like good time to start working on the client. We’ll also think about how we want to test our walking skeleton end-to-end. </summary>
